:::Torca/Sky Lynx/Sideswipe/Ratchet/Orion:::

::Torca dodges the laser blasts and destroys the energy seeking missles he 
jumps away from the grenade and only gets hit by some of the sonic energy::
Torca: I have not yet begun to battle!
::He fires 13 nails at Dark One and 12 at Breakdown.  Sky Lynx  destroys one 
missle but gets hit by the other.  The fireball slightly charr his cargo bay. 
 he gets hit by 1 stinger missle.  Ares' powerful blasts were burning holes 
in his armor, and mech fluid was starting to pour out.  he fires 1 missle 
from his first missle launcher at Pyro, 1 at Bumblebee, and 2 from his other 
launcher at Ares. Ratchet escapes the rounds, but gets hit by the optic 
blasts. One of Sixshots blasts hits him in the arm.  he fires 15 shots from 
one blaster and 1 exploding sword missle at Scavenger, and 15 shots from his 
other gun and 1 exploding sword missle at Sixshot.  Sideswipe escaped the 
purple laser but got hit by all the crimson optics and the laser bolts.  he 
fired 13 shots and 1 missle at Demon Wulf, 12 shots and 1 missle at Flesh 
Ripper.  Orion was once again able to destroy the missle.  he was hit by 4 
stinger missles between Injector and Bumblebee. He fired 1 missle at 
Injector, 1 at where he thoguht Double Punch was, and 25 rapid fire optic 
blasts at Bumblebee::

--part1_3a.e50e9e1.27702c55_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"

One of Sixshots blasts hits him in the arm.  he fires 15 shots from <BR>one blaster and 1 exploding sword missle at Scavenger, and 15 shots from his <BR>other gun and 1 exploding sword missle at Sixshot.  Sideswipe escaped the <BR>purple laser but got hit by all the crimson optics and the laser bolts.  he <BR>fired 13 shots and 1 missle at Demon Wulf, 12 shots and 1 missle at Flesh <BR>Ripper.  Orion was once again able to destroy the missle. &nbs!
